incentives.description: Fuel economy inputs for US mx

extra_copy.content: All cars have Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive, adaptive air suspension, premium interior and sound.

Range figures based on EPA standard. Your actual vehicle range will vary depending on the vehicle configuration, battery age and condition, driving style and operating, environmental and climate conditions. EPA standard may be useful in comparing ranges among electric vehicles.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors that digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels—for far better handling and traction control. Your car can drive on either motor, so you don't need to worry about getting stuck on the road.
* Prices above include potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
All prices are shown without potential incentives or gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
* Prices shown include the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings for a total of {SAVING_PRICE}.
Prices shown without the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings for a total of {SAVING_PRICE}.

groups.name: Max Price of Long range trim

extra_copy.content: $750 Clean Fuel Reward is now available for California residents.

Businesses and tax-exempt organizations can claim up to a $7,500 credit for new Tesla vehicles. There is no limit on the number of credits your business can claim. This credit amount applies to deliveries now.

Businesses and tax-exempt organizations can claim up to a $7,500 credit for new Tesla vehicles under 14,000 pounds, and up to $40,000 for Tesla Semi. There is no limit on the number of credits your business can claim.
For businesses, the credits are nonrefundable, so you can't get back more on the credit than you owe in taxes. Tax-exempt entities have the option to take a direct payment in lieu of the credit.
This credit amount applies to deliveries now. There are no adjusted gross income or price cap limitations for businesses or tax-exempt organizations.
Your company's eligibility for any tax credits depends on the organization's tax situation. We recommend speaking with a tax professional for guidance.

Included with every new Tesla, Autopilot enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. There to assist with the most burdensome parts of driving, Autopilot works alongside features like emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive uses independent front and rear motors for improved performance and traction in all conditions, enabling lightning-fast response from the accelerator pedal. Unlike traditional engines, Tesla’s motors and powertrain require no scheduled maintenance for the lifetime of ownership.

Charge anywhere there is electricity. Most range used for daily driving can be topped off using the 110V Mobile Connector Bundle, or upgrade to a 220V Tesla Wall Connector for the best home charging experience. For long drives, Model X adds up to 175 miles of range in just 15 minutes on Tesla’s Supercharger network.

Remotely control and monitor your Tesla with Phone Key keyless driving, range & charging status, climate control, live GPS location and more. You can even schedule service and monitor your entire Tesla ecosystem, including power flow from Powerwall or from Solar Roof and Solar Panels.

A HEPA filtration system capable of stripping the outside air of pollen, bacteria, and pollution before they enter the cabin systematically scrubs the air inside the cabin to eliminate any trace of these particles, resulting in a system hundreds of times more efficient than standard automotive filters.

Stay comfortable in cold weather with front and rear seat heaters, a heated steering wheel, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters. Using the Tesla mobile app, you can activate cabin and battery pre-conditioning to automatically warm the cabin and prep the car’s battery for cold-weather driving to maximize range and efficiency.
Easily charge your smartphone, conveniently positioned in a center-mounted holster for simple and secure docking

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display.  Model X will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you while driving under 15 mph.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you anywhere in a parking lot, and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.
Tesla-designed silicon optimized for computer vision enables detailed, onscreen environment visualization and eventual Full Self-Driving Capability through over-the-air software updates.
Range varies with wheel and seating selection and is reflected under each option

Tesla designed Model X from the ground-up as an electric vehicle — each component, including batteries, motors and exterior aerodynamics are optimized to benefit from one another and create one of the most efficient, yet unbelievably powerful vehicles ever built.
Premium 22-speaker audio with Active Road Noise Reduction
Multi-device music and media over Bluetooth®
FM Radio, SiriusXM and Internet Streaming Radio
Tilting 17” center display, 12.3” driver’s display, and 9.4” second row display
Gaming computer with 10 teraflops of processing power
Ultraviolet and infrared protection on all glass
Heated seats for every passenger, heated steering and heated windshield
Custom driver profiles with automatic easy-entry and exit
Automatic opening and closing front doors
Front center console with sliding cup holders and storage
92 ft³ of cargo space including a secure front trunk
Automatic opening and closing rear liftgate
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Video Streaming with access to Netflix, Hulu, Youtube, Twitch, and more

Internet Browser
*New features that become available after delivery may be subject to additional charges.
Emergency lane departure avoidance and correction
Model X includes Navigation standard and a 1 year Premium Connectivity trial enabling:
Video Streaming, allowing access to content from Netflix, Hulu, Youtube, Twitch, and more
Premium 22-speaker audio with active noise cancelling
Multi-device music and media over Bluetooth®
FM Radio, SiriusXM and Internet Streaming Radio
Tilting 17” center display, 12.3” driver’s display, and 8” second row display
Gaming computer with 10 teraflops of processing power
Ultraviolet and infrared protection on all glass
Heated seats for every passenger, heated steering and heated windshield
Custom driver profiles with automatic easy-entry and exit
Automatic opening and closing front doors
Front center console with sliding cup holders and storage
92 ft³ of cargo space including a secure front trunk
Automatic opening and closing rear liftgate
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors

Our fully adaptive suspension responds to road conditions and driver input hundreds of time per second to give you better steering response, sporty handling and improved ride comfort, and the system will automatically lower itself based on speed and road type for improved efficiency and range. Like many Tesla systems, our adaptive suspension will continue to improve over time with over-the-air software updates.

The largest all glass panoramic windshield in production provides a seamless view of the stars and sky above. Optimized solar tinting and an obstruction-free view creates unlimited visibility for the driver and up to six passengers.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors for improved redundancy, each with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels for far better handling and traction control.

extra_copy.content: * Prices include potential incentives and estimated gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
All prices are shown without potential incentives or gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
* Prices shown include the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings for a total of {SAVING_PRICE}.

props.classes: tds-text--h6 tds-text--start text-loader--subtitle tds-text--500 tds-text_color--30 tds--vertical_padding-10

extra_copy.content: Front doors automatically open as you approach with your phone. Easily close the driver’s door with a tap of the brake pedal, and control the Falcon Wing Doors, front trunk and rear liftgate from the center display or your Tesla Mobile App.

Model X offers up to 92 ft³ of cargo space, including a secure front trunk, and can seat up to 7 adults. The front trunk can fit a full-size carry-on suitcase, and the rear seats can fold flat at the press of a button, opening up the rear cargo area and under-floor storage for maximum flexibility to fit any lifestyle.

Continuous 360° monitoring protects your Tesla when left unattended. Enabling Sentry Mode activates a “Standby” state, like many home alarm systems, which uses the car’s external cameras to help detect and protect against potential threats.

All-new Live Camera, available with Premium Connectivity, lets you remotely view your car's surroundings while in park, and also honk, flash and talk through the car’s speaker. Live Camera is end-to-end encrypted and cannot be accessed by Tesla.
Model X offers five, six and seven-seat configuration options – each enabling a functional and comfortable cabin experience.
Model X Plaid is available only in six seat configuration.

With 2200 x 1300 resolution, true colors and exceptional responsiveness, an adjustable 17” display tilts left or right for gaming, movies and more. A second display in front of the driver features the most essential vehicle driver information, including Full Self-Driving Visualization, while a third display second-row screen provides even more entertainment and control for rear passengers.
Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with today’s newest consoles via Tesla Arcade. Wireless controller compatibility allows gaming from any seat.

Airflow and temperature are controlled entirely through the displays without any physical vents. On hot days, Cabin Overheat Protection ensures interiors always stay cool. In cold weather, pre-conditioning automatically warms the cabin and prepares the battery for maximum range.
The ultimate focus on driving: no stalks, no shifting. With a stalkless steering yoke, you can enjoy both the best SUV to drive, and the best SUV to be driven in.
A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system offers the best listening experience, wherever you are, and new microphones enable Active Road Noise Reduction.
Automatic steering, acceleration and braking on highways
Vehicle cannot be upgraded to Full Self-Driving Capability

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model X will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

groups.name: Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

extra_copy.content: Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control is designed to slowdown and stop for visible traffic lights or stop signs that are detected when Traffic-Aware Cruise Control or Autosteer is engaged.
Features subject to change and may vary based on hardware configuration. New features that become available after delivery may be subject to additional charges.
* Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, for 8 years following the new vehicle’s original delivery. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 1 year, then available as a subscription.

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, until {sc-duration}. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 30 days, then available as a subscription.
All-Season tires are designed to work across the widest range of conditions and offer good traction and comfort in moderate climates

Summer tires offer the best traction in warmer weather, especially for performance vehicles at higher speeds. Summer tires have reduced traction and increased noise below 40˚F, and for safety reasons, should not be driven on snow or ice.

Winter tires offer the best traction in conditions below 40˚F. For the optimal winter driving experience, we recommend fitting winter wheels and tires just before the season’s first snowfall. Winter wheel and tire packages are available on the Tesla Shop.
Automatic steering, acceleration and braking on highways

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
All functionality of Basic Autopilot and Enhanced Autopilot
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

Autopilot is a pre-requite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability; after you purchase Autopilot, your vehicle will be eligible for the Full Self-Driving Capability subscription.
A Full Self-Driving computer installation of ##cost## is required. Once the installation is complete, you will be eligible to subscribe.

By ##ACTION##, your saved payment method will be charged and auto-billed monthly. To learn more visit ##termsAndConditions##.

Full Self-Driving Capability Subscription can be cancelled anytime, however, they cannot be refunded. To learn more visit ##cancellationPolicy##.

If applicable, tax is calculated based on the address provided while placing an order.

The current Full Self-Driving features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The future use of these features without supervision is dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions.
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Enhanced Autopilot and will be added to your cart for an additional price

$CC01.name: Five Seats
$CC01.description: Comfortably seat five adults in two rows. Second row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

$CC02.name: Six Seats
$CC02.description:
Passenger capacity and spaciousness are balanced by open access between the second and third row. Third row seats fold flat and flush when not in use creating extra cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.

$CC04.name: Seven Seats
$CC04.description:
Maximize passenger and cargo capacity with seating for seven adults. Second and third row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.

$CC12.name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console
$CC12.description:
Add a color matched center console for second row passengers, providing two additional cup holders and a storage cubby under the armrest. The center console is not removable and requires factory installation.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.
$CC12.long_name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console

extra_copy.content: *Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

By ##ACTION##, your saved payment method will be charged and auto-billed monthly. To learn more visit ##termsAndConditions##.

Premium Connectivity subscription can be cancelled anytime, however, it cannot be refunded. To learn more visit ##cancellationPolicy##.

If applicable, tax is calculated based on address provided while placing an order.
